Top 10 Non-Fiction Books

Here are the Top 10 Non-Fiction Books of all time.
These books have had a huge impact on the readers, the content is such that it makes the reader think and question things.

  • Sapiens by Yuval Novah Harari
  • A Brief History Of Time by Stephen Hawkings
  • Capitalism And Freedom by Milton Friedman
  • 1984 by George Orwell
  • Guns, Germs, and Steel: The Fates of Human Societiesby Jared Diamond
  • Hiroshima by John Hersey
  • The Rise and Fall of the Third Reichby William L. Shirer
  • The Origins of Totalitarianismby Michael Harrington
  • The Diary of a Young Girl by Anne Frank
  • A Short History of Nearly Everythingby Bill Bryson

Top 10 Fictional books

Here are the Top 10 Non-Fiction Books of all time. These books have had a huge impact on the readers, the content is such that it makes the reader think and question things.

  • Fahrenheit 451 by Ray Bradbury
  • The Color Purple by Alice Walker
  • Adventures of Sherlock Holmes by Arthur Conan Doyle
  • The Handmaid's Tale by Margaret Atwood
  • Crime and Punishment by Fyodor Dostoevsky
  • Don Quixote by Cervantes
  • The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald
  • Kafka on the shore by Haruki Murakami
  • The Kite Runner by Khaled Hosseini
  • Moby Dick by Herman Melville
